name: the day i just had
description:
WHY SHOULD I PLAY

-dumb active ragdoll physics (think stick fight or off the sticks)

-"story" complete with quintessential awkward dialogue

-mediocre sfx and music but im proud of it so it doesnt matter

(btw heres the ost: https://tinyurl.com/dayihadOST)

(and the feedback form, if you want it: https://tinyurl.com/dayihadFEEDBACK)

OK BUT WHAT'S THE GAMEPLAY

platforming, fighting (sorta), and that's pretty much it; mainly just a platformer game that lasts 15 minutes max

ALRIGHT OKAY I GOT IT BUT LIKE WHO ARE YOU

guy with too much free time during the summer; this was made over the course of roughly 2 months. one of my first full dives into a complete game.

OK GOODBYE

bye dude

WAIT HOW DOWNLOAD

  1. smash the "download now" button and destroy its existence
  2. click "no thanks, just take me to the downloads"
  3. eradicate every molecule of the pink "download" button
  4. extract to a folder of your choice
  5. run the file that has ".exe" behind it; not a virus i swear
  6. success

post bugs/questions in the comments, goodbye and have a good day
